turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Cortney. I am super busy in the office today, can you place an order for me at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course Boss! What would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! I would love a iced Venti Shortbread Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please order it with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whip cream on it today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you. Just 2% milk and the usual nutmeg sprinkled on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What Starbucks would you like this ordered from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you place the order for the Starbucks at Longport court and Klagge Ct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that. Usually you ask for an extra shot, did you want that again today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please! An extra shot would be great today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I placed the order via the mobile app for an Iced Venti quad shot Shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: THank you again. Did it say when it would be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, when I paid through the app it gave me a time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, can you send me the info?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the receipt for the drink should be emailed to you alreADY.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, is the time listed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes it is, it will be ready for pick up in ten minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: THank you so much for placing the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Let me know if you need help with anything else
